details.description:
Welcome to the brand new luxury building located in the charming Vinegar Hill area of DUMBO! Indulge in breathtaking views of both the Manhattan Bridge and Brooklyn Bridge. Explore the numerous nearby parks, including John St Park, Main St Park, Trinity Park, Brooklyn Bridge Park, Cadman Plaza Park, Whitman Park, and many more! Treat yourself to the delightful offerings of local restaurants such as Bridge Coffee, and for those late-night cravings, you'll find beloved spots like Shake Shack just a few blocks away. This residence combines the classic essence of old-school Brooklyn with the allure of modern luxury living, making it the perfect place to call home.
Convenience is key, as the building is situated near the A, C, and F train lines, as well as the B57, B62, and B69 bus routes.
Unit features include:

details.description:
Elevated Living at 527 Grand Ave in Prospect Heights
2 bedroom with 2 bath Welcome to 527 Grand Ave, a luxury community perfectly nestled in the vibrant Prospect Heights neighborhood. Offering 1 and 2 bedroom residences with spacious layouts, premium finishes, and thoughtful design, this property redefines modern living. Tons of natural sunlight throughout.
Residents enjoy unparalleled amenities, including: - A state-of-the-art fitness center - Expansive rooftop terrace with stunning skyline views - Dedicated children?s playroom - Business conference room for remote work and meetings - Convenient elevator access
Neighborhood Highlights: Prospect Heights is a blend of historic charm and contemporary culture. Stroll down tree-lined streets to uncover trendy restaurants, cozy cafes, and boutique shops. The iconic Prospect Park, Brooklyn Botanic Garden, and Brooklyn Museum are just steps away, offering lush green spaces and endless cultural experiences. Excellent transit options, including the A and C trains, make commuting to Manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn a breeze.
Live where convenience meets character. Schedule your tour today and make 527 Grand Ave your new home!

This boutique residence is nestled along the vibrant East River Waterfront, offering spacious layouts and elegant interiors. The kitchen boasts custom ivory cabinetry, sleek white quartz countertops, and Bosch stainless steel appliances, while the in-unit washer and dryer add modern convenience. The bathroom is your private retreat with a deep soaking tub. This pet-friendly building is also conveniently close to the G train at Greenpoint Avenue, making your commute a breeze.

details.description:
----- Luxury 2 bedroom 1bath, available now ------
Housed in what was formerly known as the Empire State Dairy Company, The Highland is one of Brooklyn?s most recent landmarked buildings. Steeped in rich history, The residence now spans 14 stories and offers Studio, 1, 2, and 3 bedroom homes.
Our units feature ? Modern Elegant Kitchens ? Quartz Countertops ? Stainless Steel Appliances ? Panelized Dishwashers ? In-unit washer/dryer ? Floor- to- ceiling windows ? White Oak Flooring ? Mini split heating/cooling system
Bathroom features include ? White Oak Vanities ? Floor-to-ceiling grooved ceramic wall tiles ? Deep soaking tub ? Stone style floor tiles
Our building features ? Laundry room ? Bike Storage ? Resident Lounge ? Business Center ? Kids Playroom ? Fitness Center ? Rooftop Lounge ? Two Outdoor Terraces
Located just south of Highland Park, Cypress Hills is home to passionate individuals who share a strong appreciation for their neighborhood due to its rich and vibrant history, local bars, restaurants, and cafes, and community gardens, parks, and green spaces. Boasting 101 acres, Highland Park is situated on a high plateau and offers stunning views of the Ridgewood Reservoir, Rockaways, and Atlantic Ocean. Additional parks and green spaces include Shirley Chisholm State Park, Hamilton Beach Park, Sperandeo Brothers Playground, the Herbal Garden of East New York, George Walker Jr. Park, Martin Luther King Jr. Playground, Grace Playground, Noakhali Cricket Field, and Sutter Ballfields.

*Located just blocks away from multiple train links and all the neighborhoods best bars, restaurants, shopping, parks and more!
The unit boasts brand new finishes, 3 queen sized bedrooms, ample closet space, high ceilings, chefs kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and granite countertops, large living area, marble bathroom with fixtures and more! Pets allowed!
Please feel free to reach out for viewings.

amenities.other: Hardwood Floors

details.description: Breathtakingly beautiful luxury 1 bedroom apartment in the environmentally friendly Parkline. Designed to satisfy LEED Gold and Energy Star standards, The Parkline has the distinction of being one of the greenest buildings in Brooklyn. Literally just a stroll from the tranquil beauty of Prospect Park and the B/Q trains for easy commute into Manhattan. Call me today and we can arrange a viewing!

Breathtakingly beautiful luxury 1 bedroom apartment in the environmentally friendly Parkline. Designed to satisfy LEED Gold and Energy Star standards, The Parkline has the distinction of being one of the greenest buildings in Brooklyn. Literally just a stroll from the tranquil beauty of Prospect Park and the B/Q trains for easy commute into Manhattan. Call me today and we can arrange a viewing!

Expansive 1bed apartment brimming with charm in a prime location. Hardwood floors, oversized windows, and original exposed brick throughout offer an inspiring living space for all of your needs! The kitchen is clean with nicely finished white appliances and cabinets. Great storage throughout the apartment, and the large bedroom in back has a *three* huge windows and a closet.
You'll love the incredible location on one of the most desirable BK Heights blocks. Grab a beverage at the popular Vineapple Cafe right downstairs, and then you're just steps away from Cadman Plaza Park, the Brooklyn Bridge Park+Roller Rink, and everything else in Downtown Brooklyn. Manhattan is just minutes away, with super easy via the 2, 3, and A trains, as well as the Brooklyn and Manhattan Bridges.
Message me to view today!

SHARED BACKYARD!
Welcome to 108 Cooper St in vibrant Bushwick, Brooklyn. This apartment seamlessly combines character with modern amenities for the ultimate living experience. Check out these amazing highlights:
? Vaulted Ceilings: A vast, open feel that makes the space feel even bigger. ? 2 Spacious Bedrooms: Perfectly sized to fit large furniture and plenty of storage. ? Shared Outdoor Retreat: A relaxing space to unwind or socialize with neighbors. ? Flooded with Light: Oversized windows let natural sunlight pour in, brightening every corner. ? Gourmet Kitchen: Sleek stainless-steel appliances for cooking and entertaining. ? Stylish Tiled Bathroom: Complete with a deep tub to soak away the stress. ? Gorgeous Wood Floors: Beautiful and easy to care for, adding warmth and charm.
Don?t miss your chance to call this place home!

details.description:
The open-plan living and dining area is spacious and airy, with plenty of room for entertaining and relaxation. The kitchen has modern appliances, including a gas stove, refrigerator, and dishwasher, and features plenty of counter and cabinet space.
The bedroom is generously sized, with ample space for a queen-sized bed and other furniture. The bathroom has been recently updated with new fixtures and finishes, including a modern vanity and a shower/tub combo.
The building has a live-in superintendent and offers amenities such as a laundry room and a bike storage area. It is conveniently located near several subway lines, including the 2, 3, 4, and 5 trains, providing easy access to Manhattan and other parts of Brooklyn. There are also many restaurants, bars, and shops in the area, making it a great neighborhood for those who love to explore.

Welcome to your new home in the heart of Greenpoint!!
Discover an expansive and brand-new building with apartments that combines style, comfort, and convenience?available with no fee. Situated steps from McCarren Park, this stunning residence is flooded with natural light and packed with high-end features designed to elevate your living experience.
Apartment Features:
In-unit laundry for ultimate convenience Gleaming hardwood floors Central A/C for year-round comfort Private balcony offering serene views Roof access with breathtaking city and skyline views Modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and stone countertops Video intercom for added security Sun-drenched living area perfect for relaxation Spacious private outdoor space

details.description:
Discover this spacious 2-bedroom, 1-bath gem in the heart of Stuyvesant Heights! With gorgeous hardwood floors, high ceilings, and exposed brick details, the apartment has a perfect blend of charm and modern touches. The open living space flows into a sleek, updated kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances, a built-in microwave, and polished granite countertops. Large windows in every room flood the space with natural light, and there?s plenty of closet space to keep everything organized.
Located just steps from the Utica Ave subway station (A, C), making commuting a breeze.
Key Features:
Lofty ceilings Hardwood flooring throughout Exposed brick accents Central A/C Video intercom system On-site laundry Eat-in kitchen layout Stainless steel appliances + microwave Granite countertops Shared outdoor courtyard
Contact us today to book a tour and see it in person!

Discover your new home in this stunning 2 Bed / 1 Bath apartment at 1605 New York Ave, Unit 3B in East Flatbush, Brooklyn. This beautifully designed, brand-new apartment features spacious bedrooms and ample closet space, complemented by large windows that flood the living area with natural light. Enjoy modern amenities, including hardwood floors, high ceilings, and a contemporary kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances and a dishwasher.
Step outside to the furnished roof deck for a breath of fresh air or relax in your private outdoor space. With central air conditioning and video intercom for security, this apartment combines comfort and convenience in a vibrant neighborhood. Conveniently located near the Flatbush Av ? Brooklyn College subway station (2, 5), this is the perfect place to call home. Don't miss out on this opportunity!

FREE LAUNDRY IN BUILDING!

Available for immediate move-in!
Beautiful and spacious 1BR APT in Ozone Park. Brand new kitchen. True living room area. Large size bedroom. 3 total closets.
Located in a well maintained complex. The complex features super on-site, maintenance personnel, laundry in the complex and parking ($).
Conveniently located close to JFK international airport. Only a few blocks away from the A train.
Pets are allowed case by case. Heat, hot water and gas included.
Contact me with your move-in date, income/credit and if you have any pets for a showing today!

Spacious studio apt completely renovated just last year!
The apt features a new kitchen with granite countertops. The bathroom features beautiful porcelains tiles. The apt features 2 double size closets plus an additional shelving closet for towels and/or sheets. The living area is large enough to have a queen size bed, a coach, bedroom furniture and a table and not feel too crowded.
Located in a well maintained complex with manager on site, super on site, laundry and parking($).
Get all the benefits of living in a condo-like complex without having to pay a monthly maintenance fee!
Contact me at 347-938-8264 with your move-in date, income/credit and if you have any pets for a showing today!

Introducing the Winslow, Astoria?s latest gem and waterfront marvel nestled in the charming Hallets Point neighborhood of Queens
This boutique tower stands as a testament to modern luxury, offering an unparalleled living experience with breathtaking views of both the tranquil waterfront and the iconic New York City skyline. Located in close proximity to buses and the ferry, the Winslow provides convenient access to transportation, ensuring that residents can easily explore the vibrant city beyond. The Winslow sets itself apart with its thoughtfully designed units, boasting spacious layouts, expansive windows, and private balconies in most residences. Revel in the beauty of these homes, featuring meticulously crafted kitchens with high-end appliances and elegantly tiled bathrooms. Each detail has been carefully curated to create a harmonious living space that combines comfort and sophistication.
This premier waterfront tower not only offers stunning residences but also an array of exceptional amenities. Residents can take advantage of convenient parking, secure bike storage, and a dedicated package room. The Winslow goes above and beyond with additional features like a well-equipped gym, game room, and business lounge. The rooftop, adorned with picturesque views and grilling stations, provides the perfect setting for social gatherings. With balconies in most units and a majority enjoying water views, the Winslow promises a lifestyle of tranquility and luxury. As the newest addition to Astoria, a neighborhood known for its proximity to Manhattan coupled with its serene ambiance, the Winslow stands out as a haven of modern living in the heart of the city.

details.description:
Luxury Apartments at 931 Carroll Street
Welcome to 931 Carroll Street, a brand-new luxury rental building in the heart of Brooklyn. Just a block from the Brooklyn Botanical Gardens and the Brooklyn Museum, and within walking distance of Prospect Park, this location offers an unbeatable blend of culture and nature. Only 2 blocks from the 2, 3, 4, 5 trains and the Shuttle to the A, C, Q trains, you're perfectly positioned for quick access across the city.
Offering studio, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom apartments, each unit boasts modern design, premium finishes, and oversized windows with stunning views.
Features include: In-unit washer/dryer Dishwasher Hardwood floors Private outdoor space (balcony, courtyard, or patio) Central air and expansive windows for natural light
Building Amenities: State-of-the-art fitness center Landscaped rooftop terrace with panoramic city views Tranquil courtyard for relaxation Garage parking, bike room, and storage options Media room, package room, and pet spa
Live in luxury, surrounded by cultural landmarks and green spaces. With excellent public transportation and nearby shopping and dining options, 931 Carroll Street is your gateway to the best of Brooklyn.

amenities.other: Balcony/Terrace, Dishwasher, Washer/Dryer In Unit, Central A/C
